titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Scrapbook of Campus Life 1915-1920
titlestmt.subtitle: Scrapbook of Campus Life UA 78

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid created by Special Collections Staff, Wendy Korwin, 2007

frontmatter.titlepage:
Inventory of the Scrapbook of Campus Life, 1915-1920 A Collection in the
Special Collections Research Center UA 78
Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary 2009 &contact;
Processed By
Special Collections Staff.

archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.abstract: A soft black leather album with a stylized "W&M" on the cover containing pictures of William and Mary students, faculty, buildings, and events.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open to all researchers.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Before publishing quotations or excerpts from any materials, permission must be obtained from the University Archives, and the holder of the copyright, if not Swem Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Scrapbook of Campus Life, Special Collections Research Center, Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The materials were acquired by Special Collections Research Center from Gift on 07/28/1983.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: A soft black leather album with a stylized "W&M" on the cover containing pictures of William and Mary students, faculty, buildings, and events.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This Collection is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.

controlaccess.head: Topical Term:
controlaccess.subject: Buildings and Grounds
Buildings and Grounds -- Lake Matoaka and Matoaka Woods
Buildings and Grounds -- Old Library (1908)
Students--Women
Students--Women--Admission in 1918
Wren Building (Williamsburg, Va.)
